summary.span: 雖然 會取代並且將功能加入至之前版本的 控制項；不過，也可以選擇保留 ，以提供回溯相容性 (Backward Compatibility) 以及供未來使用。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 為了讓若要顯示，您必須將它加入或。In order for a to be displayed, you must add it to a or . 若要建立子功能表，您可以新增物件至屬性之父代。To create submenus, you can add objects to the property of the parent . 類別提供屬性，可讓您設定的外觀和功能的功能表項目。The class provides properties that enable you to configure the appearance and functionality of a menu item. 若要顯示的功能表項目旁邊的核取記號，請使用屬性。To display a check mark next to a menu item, use the property. 您可以使用這項功能，來識別在互斥的功能表項目清單中選取的功能表項目。You can use this feature to identify a menu item that is selected in a list of mutually exclusive menu items. 例如，如果您有一組功能表項目設定的文字色彩控制項，您可以使用屬性來識別目前選取的色彩。For example, if you have a set of menu items for setting the color of text in a control, you can use the property to identify which color is currently selected. 屬性可用來定義選取的功能表項目是可以按下鍵盤組合。The property can be used to define a keyboard combination that can be pressed to select the menu item. 針對多重文件介面 (MDI) 應用程式中顯示的物件，您可以使用方法來合併的 MDI 功能表的父代與它的子表單，以建立合併的功能表結構。For objects displayed in a Multiple Document Interface (MDI) application, you can use the method to merge the menus of an MDI parent for with that of its child forms to create a consolidated menu structure. 因為無法重複使用多個位置中相同的時間，例如在並，您可以使用方法來建立一份用於另一個位置。Because a cannot be reused in multiple locations at the same time, such as in a and a , you can use the method to create a copy of a for use in another location. 事件可讓您執行工作，才會顯示功能表。The event enables you to perform tasks before a menu is displayed. 例如，您可以建立這個事件，以顯示或隱藏功能表項目，根據您的程式碼狀態的事件處理常式。For example, you can create an event handler for this event to display or hide menu items based on the state of your code. 事件可讓您執行工作，例如當使用者將滑鼠指標置於上方的功能表項目時，為您的應用程式的功能表項目提供詳細的說明。The event enables you to perform tasks such as providing detailed help for your application's menu items when the user places the mouse pointer over a menu item. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立表單功能表結構。The following code example creates a menu structure for a form. 範例程式碼加入來代表最上層功能表項目中，選取字型的大小，會將子功能表項目新增到它，然後將兩個功能表項目新增至該功能表項目，表示應用程式中的大型和小型的字型選項。The example code adds a to represent the top-level menu item, adds a submenu item to it for selecting a font size, and then adds two submenu items to that menu item that represent large and small font choices in an application. 這個範例需要有名為物件`mainMenu1`和第四個命名的物件`menuItem1`， `menuItem2`， `menuItem3`，和`menuItem4`。The example requires that there is a object named `mainMenu1` and four objects named `menuItem1`, `menuItem2`, `menuItem3`, and `menuItem4`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您使用功能表項目的指定標題`text`參數，您也可以指定便捷鍵加上 '&' 字元，用於為便捷鍵字元之前。When you specify a caption for your menu item with the `text` parameter, you can also specify an access key by placing an '&' character before the character to be used as the access key. 比方說，若要指定"F"中 「 檔案 」 做為便捷鍵，您會指定功能表項目的標題 」 及檔案 」。For example, to specify the "F" in "File" as an access key, you would specify the caption for the menu item as "&File". 您可以使用這項功能可提供您功能表的鍵盤巡覽。You can use this feature to provide keyboard navigation for your menus. 設定`text`參數，以 「`-`"會導致您的功能表項目，以顯示做為分隔符號 （水平列），而不是標準的功能表項目。Setting the `text` parameter to "`-`" causes your menu item to be displayed as a separator (a horizontal line) rather than a standard menu item. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立，它是的建構在指定功能表項目的標題。The following code example creates a that specifies the caption of the menu item at the time it is constructed. remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您使用功能表項目的指定標題`text`參數，您也可以指定便捷鍵加上 '&' 的存取金鑰做該字元前面。When you specify a caption for your menu item with the `text` parameter, you can also specify an access key by placing an '&' before the character to be used as the access key. 比方說，若要指定"F"中 「 檔案 」 做為便捷鍵，您會指定功能表項目的標題 」 及檔案 」。For example, to specify the "F" in "File" as an access key, you would specify the caption for the menu item as "&File". 您可以使用這項功能可提供您功能表的鍵盤巡覽。You can use this feature to provide keyboard navigation for your menus. 設定`text`參數，以 「`-`"會導致您的功能表項目，以顯示做為分隔符號 （水平列），而不是標準的功能表項目。Setting the `text` parameter to "`-`" causes your menu item to be displayed as a separator (a horizontal line) rather than a standard menu item. 此外，您可以使用這個建構函式來指定要處理的委派功能表項目所建立的事件。In addition, you can use this constructor to specify a delegate that will handle the event for the menu item being created. 必須設定您將傳遞給這個建構函式呼叫事件處理常式可以處理事件。The that you pass to this constructor must be configured to call an event handler that can handle the event. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information on handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立物件使用指定的標題和連接到將處理的事件處理常式的委派功能表項目的事件。The following code example creates a object with a specified caption and an delegate connected to an event handler that will handle the event for the menu item. remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您使用功能表項目的指定標題`text`參數，您也可以指定便捷鍵加上 '&' 的存取金鑰做該字元前面。When you specify a caption for your menu item with the `text` parameter, you can also specify an access key by placing an '&' before the character to be used as the access key. 比方說，若要指定"F"中 「 檔案 」 做為便捷鍵，您會指定功能表項目的標題 」 及檔案 」。For example, to specify the "F" in "File" as an access key, you would specify the caption for the menu item as "&File". 您可以使用這項功能可提供您功能表的鍵盤巡覽。You can use this feature to provide keyboard navigation for your menus. 設定`text`參數，以 「`-`"會導致您的功能表項目，以顯示做為分隔符號 （水平列），而不是標準的功能表項目。Setting the `text` parameter to "`-`" causes your menu item to be displayed as a separator (a horizontal line) rather than a standard menu item. `items`參數可讓您指派來定義這個功能表項目的子功能表的功能表項目的陣列。The `items` parameter enables you to assign an array of menu items to define a submenu of this menu item. 陣列中的每個項目也可以指派給它的功能表項目的陣列。Each item in the array can also have an array of menu items assigned to it. 這可讓您建立完整的功能表結構，並將它們指派給功能表項目的建構函式。This enables you to create complete menu structures and assign them to the constructor for the menu item. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information on handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立物件使用指定的標題，連線至的方法，將處理之事件的事件處理常式每個功能表項目在子功能表項目的陣列。The following code example creates an object with a specified caption, an event handler connected to a method that will handle the event each menu item in an array of submenu items. `mergeType` and `mergeOrder` parameters allow you to determine how this menu item will behave when the menu item is merged with another menu. 您指定的值而定`mergeType`參數，您可以新增、 移除、 取代或合併的功能表項目並將與合併的功能表及其子功能表項目。Depending on the value you specify for the `mergeType` parameter, you can either add, remove, replace, or merge the menu item and its submenu items with the menu that it is merging with. `mergeOrder`參數可讓您決定其中所建立的功能表項目時，會定位在合併功能表。The `mergeOrder` parameter determines where the menu item being created will be positioned when the menu is merged. remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用組合中的其他功能表項目，以提供應用程式狀態的功能表中的屬性。You can use the property in combination with other menu items in a menu to provide state for an application. 比方說，您可以將核取記號置於功能表項目群組中的項目，以識別要顯示的應用程式中的文字字型的大小。For example, you can place a check mark on a menu item in a group of items to identify the size of the font to be displayed for the text in an application. 您也可以使用屬性，以識別一組互斥的功能表項目中選取的功能表項目。You can also use the property to identify the selected menu item in a group of mutually exclusive menu items. > [!NOTE] > 這個屬性不能設定為`true`最上層的功能表項目。This property cannot be set to `true` for top-level menu items. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用屬性以提供應用程式中的狀態。The following code example uses the property to provide the state in an application. 在此範例中，一組功能表項目用來指定文字的色彩控制項。In this example, a group of menu items are used to specify the color for the text in a control. 提供事件處理常式會由事件的三個功能表項目。The event handler provided is used by the event of three menu items. 每個功能表項目指定的文字色彩`menuItemRed`（紅色）， `menuItemGreen` （綠色），或`menuItemBlue`（藍色）。Each menu item specifies a text color, `menuItemRed` (Red), `menuItemGreen` (Green), or `menuItemBlue` (Blue). 事件處理常式判斷已按下的功能表項目、 將選取的功能表項目中，核取記號和變更表單的文字色彩控制項。The event handler determines which menu item was clicked, places a checkmark to the selected menu item, and changes the text color of the form's control. 這個範例需要已加入此程式碼置於表單的命名空間。The example requires that the namespace has been added to the form that this code is placed in. 這個範例也需要已新增至表單，此範例程式碼位於名為`textBox1`。The example also requires that a has been added to the form that this example code is located in that is named `textBox1`. summary.span: 功能表項目的功能表項目清單顯示前發生。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個事件只會在功能表項目具有子功能表項目可以顯示時發生。This event only occurs when a menu item has submenu items to display. 您可以使用這個事件處理常式來新增、 移除、 啟用、 停用，請選取此項目，或取消選取 根據您的應用程式的狀態，才能讓它們顯示的功能表項目。You can use this event handler to add, remove, enable, disable, check, or uncheck menu items based on the state of your application before they are displayed. 如需有關如何處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用事件，以判斷是否中所顯示的功能表顯示之前，已啟用支援剪下、 複製，並刪除作業的物件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the event to determine whether objects that provide support for cut, copy, and delete operations are enabled before the menu they are displayed in is shown. 此範例會判斷如果`textBox1`，則控制項在表單上、 已啟用、 具有輸入焦點，而且有之前啟用選取的文字物件。The example determines if `textBox1`, a control on the form, is enabled, has input focus, and has text selected before enabling the objects. 這個範例需要該三物件會建立名為`menuCut`， `menuCopy`，和`menuDelete`已建立。This example requires that three objects are created named `menuCut`, `menuCopy`, and `menuDelete` have been created. remarks.format: ## Remarks 核取記號不一定表示一組功能表項目是互斥的狀態。Check marks do not necessarily imply a mutually exclusive state for a group of menu items. 若要向使用者表示功能表項目的核取記號會互斥，您可以使用這個屬性。You can use this property to indicate to the user that the check mark of a menu item is mutually exclusive. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例使用屬性來變更應用程式的狀態。The following code example uses the property to change the state of an application. 在範例中，一組功能表項目會所提供的用來指定文字的色彩控制項。In the example, a group of menu items are provided that are used to specify the color for the text in an control. 在範例中，提供事件處理常式會由三個功能表項目的事件。In the example, the event handler provided is used by the event of the three menu items. 每個功能表項目指定的色彩`menuItemRed`， `menuItemGreen`，或`menuItemBlue`。Each menu item specifies a color, `menuItemRed`, `menuItemGreen`, or `menuItemBlue`. 判斷哪一個功能表項目已按下、 會放置一個核取記號來選取的功能表項目和變更表單的文字色彩的事件處理常式控制項，名為`textBox1`。The event handler determines which menu item was clicked, places a checkmark to the selected menu item, and changes the text color of the form's control, named `textBox1`. 此範例也會使用屬性來示範如何使用選項按鈕核取來顯示互斥的功能表項目。The example also uses the property to demonstrate how a radio-button check is used to show menu items that are mutually exclusive. 這個範例需要已新增至表單，其中包含這個程式碼的命名空間。This example requires that the namespace has been added to the form that contains this code. remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您指定標題為您的功能表項目時，您也可以指定便捷鍵加上 '&' 的存取金鑰做該字元前面。When you specify a caption for your menu item, you can also specify an access key by placing an '&' before the character to be used as the access key. 比方說，若要指定"F"中 「 檔案 」 做為便捷鍵，您會指定功能表項目的標題 」 及檔案 」。For example, to specify the "F" in "File" as an access key, you would specify the caption for the menu item as "&File". 您可以使用這項功能可提供您功能表的鍵盤巡覽。You can use this feature to provide keyboard navigation for your menus. 將此屬性設定為"`-`」 讓您的功能表項目顯示為分隔符號 （水平列），而不是標準的功能表項目。Setting this property to "`-`" causes your menu item to be displayed as a separator (a horizontal line) rather than a standard menu item. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立功能表項目、 設定的標題、 指派攠摝坫、 讓功能表項目可見，並顯示快顯功能表項目的索引鍵顯示。The following code example creates a menu item, sets the caption, assigns a shortcut key, makes the menu item visible, and shows the shortcut key display for the menu item. 這個範例需要也就是已建立名為`menuItem1`。The example requires that a has been created that is named `menuItem1`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用這個屬性來修改而不需要合併功能表] 或 [停用功能表的功能表結構。You can use this property to modify a menu structure without having to merge menus or disable menus. 比方說，如果您想要隱藏完整的一段您的應用程式的功能表中的功能，您可以隱藏起來使用者藉由將此屬性設定為`false`。For example, if you want to hide a complete section of functionality from the menus for your application, you can hide them from the user by setting this property to `false`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立功能表項目、 設定的標題、 指派攠摝坫、 讓功能表項目可見，並顯示快顯功能表項目的索引鍵顯示。The following code example creates a menu item, sets the caption, assigns a shortcut key, makes the menu item visible, and shows the shortcut key display for the menu item. 這個範例需要也就是已建立名為`menuItem1`。The example requires that a has been created that is named `menuItem1`.
